body:
Favicon will be always requested even in api view (json text only). Suggestion is stackoverflow is to add html favicon tag with empty base64 image. I think a better way will be to add a static favicon.ico file and redirect to it using webserver configuration or using django url (for heroku and similar services) as I did it previously in Pontoon for robots.txt

If you approve adding it to django urls.py then please assign me to that bug.
